aboutSection.introText: I'm a dedicated web developer and graphic designer with expertise in modern tools and frameworks, including Laravel, React, After Effects, Figma, Illustrator, and Photoshop. I specialize in crafting visually striking designs and building scalable, user-friendly web applications. With a focus on collaboration and innovation, I turn creative ideas into functional, impactful solutions. Letâ€™s work together to bring your vision to life!

projectsSection.introText: Following projects showcase my skills and experience through real-world examples of my work. Each project is briefly described with links to code repositories and live demos. It reflects my ability to solve complex problems, work with different technologies, and manage projects effectively.
